name: Dashni And The Swamp Monster
description:
In a post apocalyptic world... like.. VERY post apocalyptic, to the point you couldn't even tell there was a global thermouclear war there beforehand. Well.. Except there are mutants.

Meet Dashni, a rabbit-bunny-humanoid thing, who just wanted to enjoy his carrot pie.. but someone stole it.

This is a (hopefully not too) hard boss fight against a worthy foe, where you will probably die a lot.

Dashni and The Swamp Monster is a game made in a week by RedSponge and TheCrispyToasty for the LibGDX Jam of March 2020. THIS MEANS THIS GAME PROBABLY HAS BUGS!

Controls: Move with arrows, jump with space, and attack with X. You have a directional attack.
